content:
I haven't played horizon zero dawn or any other game, but i can offer you some basic information on it.

horizon zero dawn is an action role-playing game developed by guerrilla games and first released in 2017. the game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where humans live in small tribes and machines roam the lands. the protagonist, aloy, is an archer who is searching for answers about her past, the world around her, and the machines that threaten her tribe.

the game received widespread critical acclaim for its innovative gameplay mechanics, intriguing storyline, and stunning graphics. it's also praised for its unique blend of ancient and futuristic elements, which creates a compelling and immersive world.

overall, horizon zero dawn is a highly recommended game for anyone who enjoys open-world games with an intriguing storyline and innovative gameplay mechanics.
